actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt income derived by charitable organizations from conducting certain games of chance from the tax imposed on unrelated business income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt income derived by a charitable organization conducting games of chance from the tax imposed on unrelated business income. Defines "game of chance" to include bingo, raffles, pull-tabs, punchboards, sports-pools and twenty-one.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt income derived by charitable organizations from conducting certain games of chance from the tax imposed on unrelated business income.
